description: An outdoor evening gathering at a small decorated stage/altar. The handheld camera starts low on a blanket and ground area, pans upward to reveal a speaker/PA and a garlanded statue on a raised ledge, then later pans down toward seated participants and a cluster of shoes on the ground. Several people sit on chairs or the ledge and appear to watch and listen to the stage while others move into the seating area.
relationships: camera pans up toward stage area
camera pans down toward participants and seating area
activity_differential: attending a small outdoor evening ceremony (people seated and watching a decorated stage)
sound/PA equipment in use or being operated (speaker and amplifier visible near stage)
participants arriving and settling (people sit on chairs, shoes placed at the edge of the seating area)
